review: I'm a huge fan of just about everything Google provides but this device has been disappointing so far. Last week I purchased Chromecast. Setup was easy. It took about ten minutes. The first night I watched shows (from Netflix) with absolutely no problems. I came back two nights later and it would not cast Netflix (it said connection error). YouTube  works but no Netflix. I called customer support and they walked me through a number of troubleshooting steps which ended with me resetting the device back to factory settings (which means you have to go through the installation steps again). No luck initially. Thirty minutes later, it started working for no reason.A few days later I tried again. No luck. I called tech support again and this time they said that it's a known problem that they are having with Netflix. They promised to get back to me within 48 hours. Without Netflix support it really doesn't hold it's value (even at such a low price).In fairness to Google, I did more research and confirmed what the last tech support person said. Evidently a firmware to the chromecast was rolled out last week and this is causing the problem.[...]It happens...I'll be glad to revisit this rating when/if they resolve this matter. Until that time, I can't give a good or even average rating if it can't do the one thing I need it to do.***UPDATE 12/31/2013*****A couple of weeks ago, the device started working correctly again. I can only assume either Google or Netflix took some corrective actions on their part (since I changed nothing on my end).*************************
author: K Karimi

review: Works well with Netflix and Youtube, but doesn't work at all with Amazon Prime. I have had this for three months and it has stopped working already. It was reinserted and worked for another three weeks but has since stopped working.
